message: message Morning last night I didn't sleep well thinking about this crooked Brain molefe selling out the country hello Brian Molefe should be charged with treason !! @Khalid Mather Thobani Mnyandu "@Minoctar Sithole The problem is "@Noluthando Masondo Thanks sisi  Solar chargers for salesmen "Shame man Mobile phone solar chargers for sales No electricity regarding "@Khalid Mather He's a director at MNS attorneys and he was lead attorney into the investigating of relocation of the OEM""S" @SABC Digital News AT LAST!!!

One sensible comment the EFF make is that CR has not reduced a bloated cabinet he has appointed more Deputy Ministers that means his cabinet has 34 members and not 28. can someone please rescue us from Jordaii please "@Lucy Lucy @Jordial.. is this a movie you recommend we watch? Aa! The Afro 4000 trains worth R600 million were unsuitable for local conditions.. they were too high. @Jordaii. Is this a virus? The diesel locomotives supplied by NCRS had major alternator problems. Boring

Go Proteas Protea power! In short this was a tender to procure Locomotives and trains with a total of R2. 65 billion but exceeded this amount by more than R1. 2 billion. How many locomotives were delivered to date? haha @ Jacob Zuma you will have to sell your expensive hats and shirts but I am certain it will be Nkandla soon. I think 18 locomotives are waiting to be delivered at a harbour in China. Remember they are assembled here. Of the 1 064 original order? This was a R600 million contract that went up by R69 million @Kevin. Yes

@Thando Nkutha I agree - I think he's failed his first test. To date 185 locomotives "I thought this came from PP and was adopted by parliament. What the President to do with law enforcement "Cameraman  R50bln was split between 4 global railway groups but infect this entire project far exceeded this amount. The entire cost was likely to be R134 billion "what's happening is outrageous! and the ""new dawn"" is one of the biggest farce I've seen!" "The ""NewDawn of Corruption ""." "Thando you will never be satisfied

1.4 trillion rand got stolen over the last 4 years in this great country. That's more than one year's tax collection! You must take into account the years that Zuma was deputy President and President don't forget how wealthy you have to be to belong to the G20. "Like I said before OEM is original equipment manufacturer? KKK probably would argue they are dealing with racial prejudice. ..just not the way we expect. other parties must win elections that's all I thought OEMs were the Transnet mechanical Engineers responsible for the assembly of these trains? @sipho cebo Or be ruled by thieves. Is this the best the ANC has to offer? That's idiotic. R11200 per sqm?? @Derek.. who was your choice to vote for.. just curious to see if we were in favour of the same party? Lindiwe again!
